text: 11.28: FG 21.10Mba Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ guma mbe, ana zɨ khare, Agabus, ana Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaar ana rugim, ana an ŋkasŋkar panan khaŋ nzuai, “Mba tivgip thir vhɨzɨrga tuga bakɨme za kha Rom guman pan gari ŋguir hɨgɨrga.” Ana maaŋ suaŋgim, zumgum Sisar Krodius ŋgui gari guman pan ki tugen, mba thir vhɨzi tuga bakɨme hɨgi.
